name: OGAD
description:
7 GAMES IN 7 DAYS
This project was a challenge to improve my game design and scoping. Every game was made under 12 hours.  Everything except the assets were made from scratch.

The games were a opportunity of growth to me, so they are not perfect. They have systemic flaws, bugs and missing polish, but what can be expected from games made under 12 hours, right? 

01 BENCHPRESS
You have to press the weight up as fast as you can. You lose power over time, before your power hits zero, you have to rack the weights to make the run count. 

Left Mouse Button to Push Weights
Right Mouse Button to Rack Weights

---

02 CAVE ESCAPE
Your mission is to escape the cave with your flashlight and grapplinghook. Finding the exit is the only priority.

W,A,S,D to Move
Left Mouse Button to Shoot Hook
Righ Mouse Button to Pull To Hook
Collect Orbs to recharge Flash Light Batteries

---

03 KING OF CARDS
You have to find the golden kingscard. Jumping and sprinting is only possible when activating the action card.

W,A,S,D to Move
1,2,3,4,5,6 to Activate Action Card
Known Bug: the Card UI doesn't update, when they are activated

---

04 TREE CHOPPER
You have to cut as many trees as you can. Watering the tree makes it grow faster, when the tree hits 100% you can chop it down with your axe.

Left Mouse Button to Pick Up Axe Or Watering Can PICKED UP - Left Mouse Button to Water Or Swing Axe

---

05 TOWER CLIMB
You have to reach the Power Orb on top of the tower. Just Equipped with your boots you have to jump your way through the more or less complex structure. 

W,A,S,D to Move
Space to Jump
Known Bug: walking of a Edge without jumping disables gravity, ergo you can walk in air

---

06 LIGHTNING EVADER
Lightning everywhere, you can't escape!
Survive as long as you can and build up your highscore.

W,A,S,D to Move
Known Bug: First Lightning strikes immediately in the begining, you better start wolking right away

---

07 ENDLESS WOODS
Run as long as you can, without hitting the trees. 

A,D to Move
Space to Jump
